Container.Name: Facet
Container.Overview: Facet is a self-hosted personal profile platform. Create multiple views of your professional profile for different audiences (recruiters, conferences, clients). Own your data, skip the tracking. Default login: admin@example.com / changeme123

Config.Name: Web UI Port
Config.Description: The port you'll use to access Facet in your browser. Change if 8080 is already in use.

Config.Name: PUID
Config.Description: User ID for file permissions. Use 99 for Unraid's nobody user, or match your host user's UID.

Config.Name: PGID
Config.Description: Group ID for file permissions. Use 100 for Unraid's users group, or match your host user's GID.

Config.Name: App Data
Config.Description: Database and configuration storage. This is small but critical - include in your appdata backups!

Config.Name: Uploads
Config.Description: Where uploaded images and files are stored. Can be large - put on a share with space if you'll upload lots of media.

Config.Name: Admin Email
Config.Description: Your email address for admin access. Required for Google/GitHub login.

Config.Name: Public URL
Config.Description: Your public URL (e.g., https://facet.yourdomain.com or http://192.168.1.100:8080). Used for OAuth callbacks and share links.

Config.Name: Trust Proxy
Config.Description: Leave as 'true' if using NPM, Cloudflare Tunnel, Traefik, or any reverse proxy. Only set 'false' if accessing directly without any proxy.

Config.Name: Google Client ID
Config.Description: For 'Sign in with Google'. Get from Google Cloud Console > APIs > Credentials. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: Google Client Secret
Config.Description: The secret from Google Cloud Console. Keep this private!

Config.Name: GitHub Client ID
Config.Description: For 'Sign in with GitHub'. Get from GitHub > Settings > Developer Settings > OAuth Apps. Redirect URI: YOUR_URL/api/oauth2-redirect

Config.Name: GitHub Client Secret
Config.Description: The secret from GitHub OAuth App settings. Keep this private!

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Enables AI features: content rewriting, project summaries, resume parsing. Get from platform.openai.com

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Alternative to OpenAI. Enables AI features using Claude. Get from console.anthropic.com

Config.Name: Ollama URL
Config.Description: Use your local Ollama instance for AI features (free, private). Example: http://192.168.1.100:11434

Config.Name: Ollama Model
Config.Description: Which Ollama model to use. llama3.2 is recommended for good quality and speed.

Config.Name: Debug Mode
Config.Description: Enables PocketBase admin UI at /_/ for troubleshooting. Leave disabled unless you need to debug database issues.
